div.p:
FHIR Version: 3.0.1
Supported formats: json
Published:2019-01-04
Published by: National Children's Digital Health Collaborative

This profile defines the expected capabilities of NCDHC Data Hub server when conforming to the NCDHC Data Hub IG The capabilitystatement resource includes the complete list of actual profiles, RESTful operations, and search parameters supported the Servers. Servers have the option of choosing from this list to access necessary data based on their local use cases and other contextual requirements.

p.strong: The NCDHC Data Hub Server SHALL:

ol.li: Support at least one additional resource profile from the list of NCDHC Data Hub Profiles
Implement REST behavior according to the FHIR specification
Support json resource formats for all NCDHC Data Hub interactions.
Identify the NCDHC Data Hub profile(s) supported as part of the FHIR Meta profile attributefor each instance.
Declare a CapabilityStatement identifying the list of profiles, operations, search parameter supported.

p.strong: The NCDHC Data Hub Server SHOULD:

ol.li: Support json resource formats for all NCDHC Data Hub interactions.

div.div:
Security:
NCDHC Data Hub Servers SHALL
implement the OAuth 2.0 documented in this guide
A server has ensured that every API request includes a valid Authorization token, supplied via:Authorization: Bearer {server-specific-token-here}
A server has rejected any unauthorized requests by returning anHTTP 401Unauthorized response code.
